rComments: Update on all previous comments from 2013. Scharper is still an amazing prof. He'll inspire you with his wisdom and empathy. Take his course, you will not regret it!
Best Prof I'v had in my undergrad.

Professor Scharper is really passionate about what he teaches, and it's really reflected in his lectures. His assignments also encourage thinking, and there is no wrong answer as long as you support your personal opinion, which he also emphasizes. Really a great course, and I look forward to taking his other course!
He is by far the most stimulating prof I ever had. Go to class, sit, interact and enjoy!
Amazing prof! very approachable and humble. He is one of the best profs at UTM especially since Dylan Clark left..

best prof i've ever had. so welcoming and nice. motivates you to do your best. even gives a speech at the end of the course that seemed like a graduation speech bidding us goodbye. fair marker. LOVE HIM!

He is one of the most intellectually stimulating professors I have had the good fortune to grow under. Go to every class and enjoy it. Let your mind breath and let your mind mingle with the the atmosphere of thoughts he creates in class.

Wow.. Surprised no one wrote a review yet because this prof is amazing. Funnest and most enthusiastic prof ever. Tests require lots of writing, but is generally easy. He does not shy away from giving everyone an A. Only problem is he is very busy and always cancels office hours and doesn't reply to emails after exams. But overall awesome person!
